Episodes.Title: The Nightmare Man (1)
Episodes.Plot: When Luke has his first nightmare, he's haunted by a dark figure from his dreams. A strange entity is reaching out to our world, with terrible consequences for the whole human race. Luke faces life-changing events, and Bannerman Road will never be the same again.
Episodes.GuestStars: Julian Bleach, Doon Mackichan, Paul Kasey, Toby Longworth

Episodes.Title: The Nightmare Man (2)
Episodes.Plot: With Luke, Clyde and Rani trapped in a bizarre dreamscape, Sarah Jane must fight alone. As the Nightmare Man grows stronger, only K-9 might hold the key. But can Luke summon the courage to face his adult life before the whole world is trapped in an endless nightmare?
Episodes.GuestStars: Julian Bleach, Doon Mackichan, Paul Kasey, Toby Longworth

Episodes.Title: The Vault of Secrets (1)
Episodes.Plot: Androvax the Veil returns to Earth and asks for the gangs help, but how can they trust him? Or is the threat posed by the Vault of Secrets great enough to overcome old enmities. And when the android guardians threaten destruction, is there really any other choice?
Episodes.GuestStars: Angus Wright, Mark Goldthorp, Cheryl Campbell, David Webber, Sophie Benjamin, Perry Blank, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti

Episodes.Title: The Vault of Secrets (2)
Episodes.Plot: When an old enemy, Androvax the Veil, returns to Earth asking for help, the gang face a dilemma ? should they trust him? Or does the legendary Vault hold an even greater terror? But a second threat arises, when android guardians threaten to destroy anyone who uncovers their secrets. As the battle between Sarah Jane, Androvax and the androids reaches its climax, Rani has to save her own mother from being caught in the crossfire. But as the Vault opens the destiny of the entire Veil  species is at
Episodes.GuestStars: Angus Wright, Mark Goldthorp, Cheryl Campbell, David Webber, Sophie Benjamin, Perry Blank, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti

Episodes.Title: Death of the Doctor (1)
Episodes.Plot: Old Companions Sarah Jane Smith and Jo Grant meet for the first time to discover the truth when the Doctor is declared dead. An interstellar conspiracy gathers around UNIT Head Quarters as Clyde finds that he holds the fate of the Time Lord in his hand.
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Smith, Katy Manning, Finn Jones, Laila Rouass, Ace Bhatti, Jimmy Vee, Phillip Hurd-Wood, David Bradley, Jon Glover, Paul Kasey, Rauri Mears, Ben Ashley

Episodes.Title: Death of the Doctor (2)
Episodes.Plot: Old friends fight together - but is it too late to stop the sinister Shansheeth?
Episodes.GuestStars: Matt Smith, Katy Manning, Finn Jones, Laila Rouass, Ace Bhatti, Jimmy Vee, Phillip Hurd-Wood, David Bradley, Jon Glover, Paul Kasey, Rauri Mears, Ben Ashley

Episodes.Title: The Empty Planet (1)
Episodes.Plot: Clyde and Rani awake to find they are the only humans on Earth, even Sarah Jane Smith has vanished. But the Earth is not deserted, stalking the streets of London, strange forces gather.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jocelyn Jee Esien, Ace Bhatti, Joe Maso, Paul Kasey, Ruari Mears, Jon Glover

Episodes.Title: The Empty Planet (2)
Episodes.Plot:
Clyde and Rani only just manage to escape from the robots.

Regrouping with Gavin in a cafe, Clyde deduces that he and Rani were left behind after the robots abducted everyone else because of the two of them having been 'grounded' by the Judoon, although this fails to explain Gavin's continued presence. When Gavin runs off again, Rani and Clyde are confronted by the robots, who explain that they want the 'son and heir' (Although Clyde initially assumes that they want Earth's sun and air); Gavin'
Episodes.GuestStars: Jocelyn Jee Esien, Ace Bhatti, Joe Maso, Paul Kasey, Ruari Mears, Jon Glover

Episodes.Title: Lost in Time (1)
Episodes.Plot: A harmless investigation turns into an epic quest across time and space.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cyril Nri, Amber Beattie, Elizabeth Rider, Fiona Hampton, Richard Wisker, Tom Wlaschiha, Gwyneth Keyworth, Lucie Jones, Morgan-Faith Hughes, Llewcus Oaten, Rowena Cooper

Episodes.Title: Lost in Time (2)
Episodes.Plot: Sarah Jane, Clyde and Rani fight across the centuries to be reunited.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cyril Nri, Amber Beattie, Elizabeth Rider, Fiona Hampton, Richard Wisker, Tom Wlaschiha, Gwyneth Keyworth, Lucie Jones, Morgan-Faith Hughes, Llewcus Oaten, Rowena Cooper

Episodes.Title: Goodbye, Sarah Jane Smith (1)
Episodes.Plot: No one can defend the earth forever, but who could ever replace Sarah Jane?
Episodes.GuestStars: Julie Graham, Eddie Marsan, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti

Episodes.Title: Goodbye, Sarah Jane Smith (2)
Episodes.Plot: Sarah Jane has gone for good, and a new regime begins at Bannerman Road!
Episodes.GuestStars: Julie Graham, Eddie Marsan, Mina Anwar, Ace Bhatti
